task.summary: Add View Holder Patter to MovieAdapterView
Add View Holder Patter to MovieAdapterView
Add Sliding Tabs to the UI
Add Sliding Tabs to the UI
Log condition when the SORTING_METHOD (Popularity or Best Rated ) is null. Note: The SORTING_METHOD --must not-- be null, so there is a bug!!
- Refactor MainActivityFragment to MovieListFragment and create inner static classes: - Solve bug that caused SORTING_METHOD to be null (when changing device orientation
Add save state to app on devive rotation
Add save state to app on devive rotation
Show trailer via Intent. Trailers work now in portrait and landscape mode

MESSAGE.value: - Refactor MainActivityFragment to MovieListFragment and create inner static classes: - Solve bug that caused SORTING_METHOD to be null (when changing device orientation
Save tab status when Activity is destroyed / recreated
Add save state to app on devive rotation
Show trailer via Intent. Trailers work now in portrait and landscape mode
